meta.title: About Us - Third Generation Grain Exporter | Shree Uma Nath Enterprises
meta.description: Established 1996 in Barh, Bihar. Three generations of expertise in Indian grains and pulses export with Pan-India trust and international quality standards.

hero.title: Building Legacy, One Container at a Time.
hero.subtitle: Shree Uma Nath Enterprises is a third-generation family-run agri-business specializing in the manufacturing, processing, and export of high-quality Indian grains and pulses.

mission.title: THREE GENERATIONS OF TRUST
mission.description: Our strength lies in generational knowledge passed down through decades of hands-on experience in agricultural commodity trading.

generations.title: First Generation
generations.description: Established strong relationships with farmers and local mandis across Bihar and neighboring states.

generations.title: Second Generation
generations.description: Modernized operations with milling infrastructure, quality grading systems, and expanded distribution networks.

generations.title: Third Generation (Current)
generations.description: Pioneering the transition to international exports, bringing global standards to a legacy business while preserving the core values of honesty and service.

about.legacyNote: This legacy of continuity ensures that we understand not just the products, but the ecosystems, seasons, and supply dynamics that determine quality and pricing year after year.

timeline.title: Local Roots
timeline.description: Established as a family-owned grain trading business in Barh, Bihar. Started with local distribution of rice and pulses to wholesalers across Bihar.

timeline.title: Pan-India Network
timeline.description: Built strong relationships with farmers and millers across Punjab, Haryana, MP, and Maharashtra. Expanded distribution to serve food processors and institutional clients across India.

timeline.title: Quality Certifications
timeline.description: Achieved APEDA registration and FSSAI licensing. Implemented NABL lab testing and sortex cleaning processes to meet international export standards.

timeline.title: International Export
timeline.description: Now exporting premium Basmati rice, pulses, and wheat to Middle East markets (UAE, Saudi, Qatar, Oman, Kuwait, Bahrain) with full documentation support and competitive pricing.

leadership.title: OUR EXCELLENCE
leadership.subtitle: Commitment to Quality in Every Grain

team.name: Quality Assurance
team.bio: Our commitment to excellence begins at the source. Through rigorous quality control and state-of-the-art testing facilities, we ensure every grain meets international standards. Our NABL-certified laboratories and sortex technology guarantee consistent, premium quality that exceeds global expectations.

team.name: Global Reach
team.bio: From local farms to international ports, our expertise spans continents. We specialize in serving Middle East and Africa markets with comprehensive logistics support, complete documentation, and reliable delivery. Our global network ensures your products arrive on time, every time.

team.name: Customer Focus
team.bio: Building lasting relationships through transparency and trust. We work closely with our clients to understand their unique requirements and deliver tailored solutions. From custom packaging to flexible payment terms, our customer-first approach ensures your success is our priority.

cta.title: Ready to partner with a trusted exporter?
cta.subtitle: Whether you need a single container trial or a long-term supply contract, we're here to support your requirements.

meta.title: Export Services & Product Specifications | Shree Uma Nath Enterprises
meta.description: Premium export-quality Indian grains and pulses with complete specifications, packaging options, and export documentation support

hero.title: Export-Quality Products with Complete Documentation
hero.subtitle: We offer premium Indian grains and pulses with rigorous quality control, flexible packaging, and full export support including FOB/CIF terms.

intelligence.title: Our Product Range
intelligence.subtitle: From procurement to port: we ensure consistent quality through direct mill sourcing, state-of-the-art processing with sortex cleaning, NABL laboratory testing, and safe warehousing in sanitary, temperature-controlled facilities.

main.title: Quality Assurance Systems
main.description: Every batch undergoes rigorous NABL laboratory testing following strictly implemented and routinely inspected guidelines. Our quality control extends from procurement through storage in safe, sanitary facilities, to efficient transportation. We make sure all our systems and their units practice the best industry standards. Optional SGS/Bureau Veritas pre-shipment inspection available for international buyers.

secondary.title: Flexible Packaging Solutions
secondary.description: Comprehensive packaging options: Bulk PP woven bags (25kg/40kg/50kg), Private Label with custom branding, or Retail-ready consumer packs (1kg/5kg/10kg). Pre-shipment drop testing on all supply sacks prior to acceptance.

small.title: FOB
small.subtitle: Mundra/Kandla
small.description: Free on Board from major Indian ports with competitive pricing.

solarYield.title: Premium Basmati Rice
solarYield.description: India's finest aromatic long-grain rice sourced from Punjab and Haryana. We procure directly from mills we've partnered with for decades, ensuring consistent quality and competitive pricing. Available in Sella, Steam, and Golden Sella variants with complete quality certification and SGS inspection support.

features.title: 1121 Creamy Sella (Parboiled)
features.description: AGL 8.30-8.40mm | <2% Broken (Premium Grade) / <5% (Standard Grade) | Moisture <14% | Creamy white color | Non-sticky texture ideal for daily consumption | Available in 25kg/40kg/50kg PP bags and private label options

features.title: 1121 Steam (Non-Parboiled)
features.description: AGL 8.35mm+ | <2% Broken | Extra Long Grain | Pure white color | Aged for superior aroma and taste | Ideal for Biryani, Pulao, and premium preparations | Export's most demanded variant

features.title: 1121 Golden Sella (Premium)
features.description: AGL 8.30mm+ | <2% Broken | Premium Grade | Deep amber color from parboiling process | Non-sticky texture | High nutritional value retained through parboiling | Longer shelf life | Preferred in Middle East markets

items.label: Kabuli Chickpeas
items.detail: Purity 99%+ | Moisture <12% | Machine cleaned & sortex processed | 25kg/50kg PP bags | FOB/CFR terms

items.label: Red Lentils (Masoor Dal)
items.detail: Purity 99.5%+ | Moisture <14% | Color: Salmon/Coral | SGS Certified | India Origin | 25kg/50kg bags

items.label: Non-Basmati Rice
items.detail: 5% Broken | Double Polished | Moisture <14% | Bulk Export | Competitive CIF Rates | 25kg/50kg bags

items.label: Other Pulses
items.value: Toor Dal, Moong Dal, Chana Dal, Bengal Gram
items.detail: Export Grade | 99%+ Purity | Full Traceability | Custom Packaging Available | MOQ: 1 x 20' FCL

cta.text: All products available with Phytosanitary Certificate, Certificate of Origin, Fumigation Certificate, and optional SGS Inspection Report.
